description: This file defines the main route component for a notes management frontend built with Qwik. It handles loading, displaying, creating, updating, and deleting notes through various signals and lifecycle hooks, as well as rendering UI components like NavBar, NotesList, and NoteEditor.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main React-like component for the notes interface, managing state and lifecycle.

methods.name: head
methods.description: Exported DocumentHead object for setting page metadata.
